attributes.action: Make it compulsory for employers to respond to all applications for vacancies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All employers should have a legal duty to repsond to all apllicants for vacancies advertised. This would encourage and engender RESPECT ( a hot issue with the current adminstration ) for others which would permeate into society.
Since currently you may spend t hours completing a rigorous app form ony to get nor replt, which is neither civil nor courteous.
